txt.en:
'We must hurry if we are to save Laerdan! Take what companions that you know to be true and enter into Sammath Baul. I know not what you may find in that dark place, but it is the only path left open to us.

'Speak with me again when you are ready to leave.'

<rgb=#FF0000>This quest is meant for a fellowship. If you choose to undertake this quest solo you will receive an inspiration bonus, but the challenge will be great.</rgb>
'[placeholder]; you have made a long journey with a great burden. Rest here for a while.'
'You should take Laerdan to Rivendell, where his body and spirit may heal.'

'Are you prepared to enter Sammath Baul? It will be a dangerous journey. Ready yourself!'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This quest is meant for a fellowship. If you choose to undertake this quest solo you will receive an inspiration bonus, but the challenge will be great.</rgb>
You have obtained the gate-key to Sammath Baul, and Gwathryn is prepared to lead an assault on the terrible prison.
'You must speak with Elrond in Imladris, [placeholder]!'
Speak with Gwathryn and enter Sammath Baul

Gwathryn is at Tármunn Súrsa in Angmar.

You should speak with Gwathryn when you are ready to enter Sammath Baul.

<rgb=#FF0000>This quest is meant for a fellowship. If you choose to undertake this quest solo you will receive an inspiration bonus, but the challenge will be great.</rgb>
Elrond is at Rivendell in the Trollshaws.\n\nYou should journey south and speak with Elrond.
